alert.note: Alert for Lauderdale; Tipton (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 11:29AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Mississippi, northern Tipton and southwestern Lauderdale Counties through NOON CDT... At 1129 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Osceola, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Covington, Ripley, Osceola, Luxora, Wilson, Keiser, Fort Pillow State Park, Brighton, Marie, Fulton, Ashport, Ft Pillow, Henning, Gilt Edge, Burlison, Garland, Victoria, Driver, O`Donnell Bend and Grider. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
